name: maoflow
description: 一个基于 Electron + FastAPI + React 的跨平台应用

scripts.build: source $(conda info --base)/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate MaoFlow && electron-vite build
scripts.build:electron: source $(conda info --base)/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate MaoFlow && electron-builder
scripts.build:backend: source $(conda info --base)/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate MaoFlow12 && cd backend && pyinstaller run.spec
scripts.build:all:mac: npm run build:backend && npm run build && mkdir -p dist/mac/MaoFlow.app/Contents/Resources/backend && cp -f backend/dist/maoflow dist/mac/MaoFlow.app/Contents/Resources/backend/ && chmod +x dist/mac/MaoFlow.app/Contents/Resources/backend/maoflow && electron-builder --mac
